thread.section_title: Lyft Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lyft | www.lyft.com | 8 of 104
thread.title: Ashley McGough

author: Ashley McGough
title: Ashley McGough
text: I was charged twice, even though they had no drivers available, so a driver never showed. Which means the whole "We only charge after your ride." Is an absolute lie! I have tried contacting customer service and I'm being told my an automatic voice operator to contact them via email instead. So, I've contacted more than once to get this cleared up and of course, I'm not getting any help. This is a sure way to lose customers.
